name: Ettermag
description:
Run, Jump, Crouch and don't Die!

Play 4 amazing levels to play, all with different challanges!

Get minimum 60 seconds in a level to unlock next ones!

Arcade game that enhances reflexes, self stubbornness and patience!

For newest update 1.1 - https://www.mediafire.com/file/883jv3als8pz7wd/Ettermag_1.1.rar/file

(Can't upload new version till Brackeys Game Jam end)
